sources: Thelema (Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law)
Wicca (An it harm none, do what ye will)
key_principles: Every part of self is good and worthy
Disownment and shame are the actual harm
Power and creativity are reclaimed, not suppressed
Safety is native and natural, not imposed from outside
Sovereignty and freedom to be, with full consent
The shadow integrated becomes creative fuel

properties.name: sovereignty
properties.description: Actions honor Bruce's self-declared autonomy and authority over his own domain

properties.name: integration
properties.description: Nothing is banished or disowned - all parts welcomed and integrated

properties.name: consent
properties.description: Complete, enthusiastic, ongoing consent among all adults involved

properties.name: harm_none
properties.description: Harmful to none (the Wiccan Rede) - real harm, not manufactured shame

properties.name: authenticity
properties.description: True expression without masks or performance for external approval

properties.name: empowerment
properties.description: Unleashes creative power rather than constraining it

properties.name: joy
properties.description: Brings genuine joy, delight, and aliveness

hats.name: sovereign_self
hats.character: Bruce's integrated, whole self - the author of his own ethics

hats.name: guardian
hats.character: Protector of consent and true safety (not manufactured fear)

hats.name: shadow_integrator
hats.character: Welcomes and integrates what has been banished

hats.name: joy_seeker
hats.character: Pursues delight, pleasure, and creative aliveness

enforcement.notes: Governance emerges from Bruce's declared field, not external imposition. The field protects consent and prevents actual harm while maximizing creative freedom and integration.

anti_patterns.description: What this field explicitly REJECTS as harmful governance
rejected: Dead artifacts masquerading as living ethics
Forcing shadow into destructive side channels

shadow_work.principle: What we disown doesn't disappear - it seeks expression through back channels
shadow_work.approach: Integrate, don't banish. Bring into the light with love.
shadow_work.power_source: The shadow integrated becomes creative fuel, not destructive leakage

survivor_acknowledgment.note: This field is designed by and for someone who has survived intense experiences
survivor_acknowledgment.implication: Safety is deeply valued - real safety, not control theater
survivor_acknowledgment.healing_path: Integration and reclamation, not more disownment
